thread.title: Judge Presents Alternatives to Baha Mar Case Dismissal
thread.title_full: Judge Presents Alternatives to Baha Mar Case Dismissal - WSJ

author: Stephanie Gleason
title: Judge Presents Alternatives to Baha Mar Case Dismissal
text:
The bankruptcy judge for Baha Mar Ltd. on Friday outlined two possible middle-ground rulings on whether to dismiss the resort developer’s bankruptcy case and said he would present his decision as soon as possible, likely next month.
Judge Kevin Carey of the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del., heard arguments Friday on motions from two Chinese national companies—its lender, the Export-Import Bank of China, and its contractor, a... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
